name: deciduous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A deciduous tree loses its leaves in autumn and grows new ones in the spring. Compare
evergreen adjective
relating to body parts that fall out or fall off and are replaced by new ones, for example a child's or young animal's first teeth
